snippet: Danny Van Poppel of the Netherlands won the 12th stage of the Vuelta a España in a mass sprint for the finish line, while Fabio Aru remained in the leader’s red jersey.
abstract: Danny Van Poppel wins 12th stage of Vuelta a Espana;  Fabio Aru retains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Danny Van Poppel of the Netherlands won the 12th stage of the Vuelta a España in a mass sprint for the finish line, while Fabio Aru remained in the leader’s red jersey.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Aru Retains Vuelta Lead
